post.body: Yah I didn't think so. I don't know what @mlydy is thinking...
I am sure no one else on Twitter thinks I'm scary. Maybe YOU'RE the scary one. Twitter survey, anyone????
WHAT???? You don't know who I used to be!! Besides, I may be better now. ;-) Why do I scare you? I'm not scary in the least. :(
Why would you ever think that about little me?????
I bet it would do if you were having a chocolate craving, but I agree. Men's cologne is awesome :) (most anyway)
There is also a chocolate-scented cologne for sale. It is advertised in my Paula Deen chocolate cookbook. I bet it's yummy!
How did you say that so well with your thumb in your mouth??? LOL
You can stop sucking your thumb now.
Yes we are doing refinances! Of course!!! :)
No I am not wearing my boots. I wish I was! They are warmer. I made it back safely...not leaving my office again today. Brrr!
You didn't see anything. <waves arms mystically> :)
LOL No! It's Christmas! Save that nonsense for New Years Eve! LOL
Especially when you've had tons of sugar and it's our third game LOL. Too bad there is no alcohol involved. That would be fun LOL
She just called me a word I can't repeat. I'm blushing. She is Swearin' Erin!
Hey! I've lost BADLY the past two games. Revenge will be mine! :)
OMG this is hysterical! (not real BTW) http://tinyurl.com/3a2ss3
Driving back from my errand, I heard the Sesame Street 12 days of Christmas on the radio. That sure made me laugh!!!! Oh the memories...
Should not have worn heels today. I'm going to break something when I leave for my errands!!!
Example...$150,000 house would cost you $782.50 per month (plus tax/ins). That's less than a lot of 2-bedroom apartments in this city!!!
Holy moly our mortgage rates are low today!!!! 30-year fixed = 4.75%, FHA 5.00%.
Everyone - follow my twin sister who is a Twitter newbie - @ernieshoegal. She's awesome and pulls off red lipstick fabulously!! :)
Frank Sinatra is singing me through my morning. <snapping fingers>
Terrible time getting to work this morning. I almost slammed into the building behind my office....someone rushed up to the window to watch!
"As a cure for weariness, close your eyes and walk through life."
Going to clean the house some now. It's messy. But I will be blaring my iPod and doing some embarrassing dance moves I'm sure....
Starting end-of-day processing. Almost time to go get started on my Saturday! :)
Tweetdeck is on my bad list now.
Just discovered how addicted to caffeine I really am. Did without coffee this morning and wow....not doing that again :) Mmm..diet coke!
Logged some much-needed miles on the treadmill. Now I will begin my night of Mr. Big, Manolos, and martinis!!! :)
Going go blow off some steam at the gym.
Two presents I received today....a bottle of vodka and the Sex and the City movie. I'm going to have an awesome night!! :)
LOL mom and sis have yet to find out that I've just found a website called "Scrabble solver" LOL LOL
Game #3 is on. Scrabble is addictive! :)
Now on our second game of Scrabble. Sister got lucky last time.
LOL My dad's laughing too hard that he can't say the "clues" LOL.
Playing a rousing game of Mad Gab with my parents, sister and brother-in-law.
Making Christmas dinner with family...tradition: steak, fried shrimp, rolls, salad and ice cream sundaes! Mmmmm!
Thrilled I got a 7-quart ceramic dutch oven and am now reading new Giada cookbook to decide what I'm going to cook first! Merry Christmas!
My parents' house is a hostel for wayward cats! Another one turned up this morning. Food and warmth! :) His name....Puss in Boots.
MERRY CHRISTMAS!! :) What a blessed day.
